column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I have tried many ramen bars
column2: but so far this one has got to be my favorite. They have many different ramen options
column3: and they also have other foods if you aren't a ramen fan. Everything I have tried here has been amazing. I usually order the spicy chicken ramen and it is too good! Only downside is that they are usually very busy and have a wait. But once you get seated
column4: the food comes pretty fast. Jinya has a nice atmosphere but is typically rather loud. Overall
